# RUN: llvm-mc --disassemble %s -triple powerpc64-unknown-unknown -mcpu=pwr7 | FileCheck %s

# CHECK: mfdcr 3, 178
0x7c 0x72 0x2a 0x86
# CHECK: mtdcr 178, 3
0x7c 0x72 0x2b 0x86

# CHECK: tlbrehi 2, 3
0x7c 0x43 0x07 0x64
# CHECK: tlbrelo 2, 3
0x7c 0x43 0x0f 0x64

# CHECK: tlbwehi 2, 3
0x7c 0x43 0x07 0xa4
# CHECK: tlbwelo 2, 3
0x7c 0x43 0x0f 0xa4

# CHECK: tlbsx 2, 3, 1
0x7c 0x43 0x0f 0x24
# CHECK: tlbsx. 2, 3, 1
0x7c 0x43 0x0f 0x25

# CHECK: dccci 5, 6
0x7c 0x05 0x33 0x8c
# CHECK: iccci 5, 6
0x7c 0x05 0x37 0x8c
